content: That sounds like a great idea! I think it would be a lot of fun to have a small tournament with prizes or awards. It would definitely add an extra level of excitement to the event. I'll make sure to check with the venue to see if they have any restrictions or recommendations for tournament formats. By the way, speaking of basketball, I've been thinking about my own game and was wondering if you could give me some tips on how to improve my free throw shooting.
